intro: Hilariously intense multiplayer battle arena! You only have one ammo to defeat your opponent. Miss your target and you will have to pick it back up or steal your enemy's!
description:
Enjoy a new "couch game" with your friends and family, presented by the publishers of the best-selling Astro Bears Party.

No luck, just skill and rage!

FOUR WEAPONS:

Hammer: You can dash over walls and ammos with this melee weapon. If you load the hammer, you will dash even further.

Bow: The snipers' favorites. If you load the bow, your arrow will be extremely fast, if not it will have some auto aiming.

Boomerang: This very fast weapon always comes back. If your load the boomerang, it keep spinning on one spot and comes back when you decide.

Slingshot: Each shot bounces three times before stopping. It's a very tricky weapon! If you load the slingshot, the projectile becomes faster, but smaller.

3 GAME MODES:

Multiplayer: fight with up to 4 players. 

Challenges (solo mode): 45 challenges to bring out your best moves.

Endless (cooperation mode): battle with friends against waves of monsters. The map changes dynamically for each wave! You will have to survive Mages, Chargers, Supports, Ranged and Melee monsters.
